review: I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Wadhwa. She us not only extremely knowledgeable and professional but also genuinely caring and empathetic. Dr. Wadhwa took the time to listen to my concerns, explained the diagnosis clearly, and provided a comprehensive treatment plan. I felt very comfortable and well cared for during my visit. Highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very empathetic and understanding. She listened to my issue clearly and suggested proper treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: In 23 years of my life , I have never been to such an empathetic doctor. I suggest everyone around me to go visit her for a detailed conversation about your health issue as she is going to help you understand the root cause of the problem. You wouldn’t come out feeling unsatisfied. Highly highly recommend her !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had an urgent situation and the doctor was very helpful and gave the perfect solution for it. Through the course of the treatment, she guided me and made sure I recovered as soon as I could. She is the most reassuring doctor I have ever been to, and would highly highly recommend consulting with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Overall good experience.  Listen to my problem patiently. Give valid cause of the problem and I am highly satisfied
She understood all my issues and heard everything out and tackled each issue and recommended not only medications but also lifestyle changes I can make to feel better.

Down to earth and have great ability to understand patients needs and have skill to diagnose root causes with good understanding and right recommendations

review: Doctor was Amazing! She was approachable on whatsapp and on call. Correct expectation was set and she provided  detailed explanation on causes, symptoms and precautionary measures. Would always recommend Dr. Rashmi. Thank you for the support!

I am extremely grateful for the exceptional care provided by Dr. Rashmi Wadhva mam. Her approach to medical treatment goes beyond professionalism; she treats me with the utmost consideration and kindness, making me feel like a valued member of her medical family. She combines medical expertise with a compassionate demeanor, creating an environment where I feel not only cared for but also understood. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.  Rashmi Wadhva mam for her outstanding commitment to patient well-being.
Very considerate doctor. Did follow ups and was always available.  She made sure my tests were done on the same day.
Great doctor, polite, gave sufficient time. Explained each and every details, explained all symptoms and treatment.

Dr Rashmi is a pleasant and knowledgeable doctor . Her diagnosis and treatment is spot on. Its lovely to meet a doctor who carefully listens to the patient understands their problems and gives treatment accordingly.  
We are satisfied wd the  treatment she offered.
Very caring person. She went out of the way to recommend the **** treatment for me. Highly recommended

She is well experienced doctor and diagnosed properly for any health issues.
Highly recommend for any health issues.

She has a very soothing effect as a doctor. Usually doctors are not very keen to listen to patients but she lends a patient listening to your concerns and she advises accordingly. Dr Rashmi gives very good meditation n is ready to help always.
Very kind and a genuine human being. I highly recommend her.  She was patient and listened to all  our problems.
